request.description:
BRD: Company admin should be able to assign attendance to the app user.

SE: Shiblu Ahmed
PO: Pranto Majumder
QA: Fuad Ahmed
Reviewer: Pranto Majumder

Objective: As a company admin, I want to assign an attendance task to a user so that the task can be completed.

Test Data: 
{
    "assigned_time": "2020-03-30T11:41:24+00:00",
    "assigned_location_lattitude": "84.35",
    "assigned_location_longitude": "56.32",
    "address": "california",
    "user_id": 168,
    "attendence_status": false,
    "admin_id": 347,
    "title": "Best Company"
}

Expected Result: 

{
    "status": true,
    "statusCode": 201,
    "data": {
        "title": "Best Company",
        "assigned_time": "2020-03-30T11:41:24+00:00",
        "assigned_location_lattitude": "84.35",
        "assigned_location_longitude": "56.32",
        "user_id": 168,
        "attendence_status": false,
        "admin_id": 347,
        "address": "california",
        "attendence_time": null,
        "attendence_location_lattitude": null,
        "attendence_location_longitude": null,
        "comment": null,
        "album_id": null,
        "id": 183,
        "createdAt": "2020-10-03T02:06:19.861Z",
        "updatedAt": "2020-10-03T02:06:19.861Z"
    }
}

Actual Result: 

{
    "status": true,
    "statusCode": 201,
    "data": {
        "title": "Best Company",
        "assigned_time": "2020-03-30T11:41:24+00:00",
        "assigned_location_lattitude": "84.35",
        "assigned_location_longitude": "56.32",
        "user_id": 168,
        "attendence_status": false,
        "admin_id": 347,
        "address": "california",
        "attendence_time": null,
        "attendence_location_lattitude": null,
        "attendence_location_longitude": null,
        "comment": null,
        "album_id": null,
        "id": 183,
        "createdAt": "2020-10-03T02:06:19.861Z",
        "updatedAt": "2020-10-03T02:06:19.861Z"
    }
}

Status code : 201
Test Status : Passed

request.description:
BRD: Company admin should be able to get assigned attendance list on the web panel.

SE: Shiblu Ahmed
PO: Pranto Majumder
QA: Fuad Ahmed
Reviewer: Pranto Majumder

Objective: As an app admin, I want to see the assigned attendance to the user by me so that I can check the status against the attendance or get updates.

Test Steps:
Select method: GET
Select the Authorization tab
Select type: Bearer Token
Paste the token: (Dashboard user login API)
Hit the "Send" button to execute the API


Expected Result: 

{
    "status": true,
    "statusCode": 200,
    "data": [
        {
            "id": 152,
            "title": "Test title for User ID: 12",
            "assigned_time": "2020-03-30T11:41:24.000Z",
            "assigned_location_lattitude": "84.35",
            "assigned_location_longitude": "56.32",
            "address": "California",
            "admin_id": 347,
            "attendence_time": null,
            "attendence_location_lattitude": null,
            "attendence_location_longitude": null,
            "attendence_status": false,
            "comment": null,
            "user_id": 168,
            "album_id": null,
            "createdAt": "2020-09-29T19:31:06.433Z",
            "updatedAt": "2020-09-29T19:31:06.433Z",
            "admin_first_name": null,
            "admin_last_name": null,
            "admin_phone": null,
            "user_first_name": "Abidur",
            "user_last_name": "Rahman",
            "user_phone": "01767666911"
        },
}

Actual Result: 

{
    "status": true,
    "statusCode": 200,
    "data": [
        {
            "id": 152,
            "title": "Test title for User ID: 12",
            "assigned_time": "2020-03-30T11:41:24.000Z",
            "assigned_location_lattitude": "84.35",
            "assigned_location_longitude": "56.32",
            "address": "California",
            "admin_id": 347,
            "attendence_time": null,
            "attendence_location_lattitude": null,
            "attendence_location_longitude": null,
            "attendence_status": false,
            "comment": null,
            "user_id": 168,
            "album_id": null,
            "createdAt": "2020-09-29T19:31:06.433Z",
            "updatedAt": "2020-09-29T19:31:06.433Z",
            "admin_first_name": null,
            "admin_last_name": null,
            "admin_phone": null,
            "user_first_name": "Abidur",
            "user_last_name": "Rahman",
            "user_phone": "01767666911"
        },
}

Status code : 200
Test Status : Passed
